```bash
du -sh -- *  | sort -rh  # Files and directories, or
du -sh -- */ | sort -rh  # Directories only
```

The output looks something like this:

```
22G     foo/
21G     bar/
5.4G    baz/
2.1G    qux/
1021M   wibble/
4.0K    wobble/
```
